assessmentQuestionVersion.name: FSC_FF_InvestmentSelection
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Which of the following portfolios align with your goals to balance potential losses and returns?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Portfolio 1: 25% exposure to growth assets Portfolio 2: 42% exposure to growth assets Portfolio 3: 66% exposure to growth assets Portfolio 4: 79% exposure to growth assets Portfolio 5: 98% exposure to growth assets
